data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 20845, Version Hash: e2f3f2bb28e1eff6138a8166fe642141748b3b9b
data.actual_result: The Credit Card or PayPal tab doesn't go away, but instead stays on your screen until you click with your mouse off.
data.expected_result: The Credit Card or PayPal option tab is suppose to go away when clicking ESC
data.short_description: Credit card or PayPal option screen for Discord Nitro doesn't go away by clicking ESC.
data.steps_to_repro: - The first thing to do is go to your setting on the bottom left - The second thing to do is go to Discord Nitro Click either $49.99 / Year or $4.99 / Month Click the Credit Card option - Hold any number down until it fills up the information Click Upgrade to Nitro It will say something went wrong, - Click okay Click the Go Back option Click ESC
